thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Ralph and Jan Fuccillo
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by Ralph and Jan Fuccillo

author: Ralph and Jan Fuccillo
title: Ralph and Jan Fuccillo
text: We are most happy with our selection of your site. The rates from PDX to OMA were by far the best, along with attention to detail, quick service, great selection of flights and quick response to our questions. I would sincerely tell all our friends and travelers that they must visit your sight and find out what happiness is when it comes to booking flights. My wife and I travel a lot and we will definitely check you out first! Thanks for being the great site we have been looking for! Ralph and Jan Fuccillo, Portland, OR.
